channel.title: Categories on Jack of All Trades
channel.description: Recent content in Categories on Jack of All Trades

item.title: Carpentry
item.author: 2e0byo@gmail.com (John Morris)
item.description: Things made largely or entirely from wood. Odd projects might end up in Workbench rather than here.

item.title: Coding
item.author: 2e0byo@gmail.com (John Morris)
item.description: Anything involving the straightforward writing of code, without worrying about what runs it later, ends up here. I’m very much an amateur, and mostly write in Python, so be kind to me ;)

item.title: Computing
item.author: 2e0byo@gmail.com (John Morris)
item.description: Notes of various kinds for things which have taken a while to work out, or strike me as particularly noteworthy.

item.title: Engineering
item.author: 2e0byo@gmail.com (John Morris)
item.description: Anything involving metal, or woodwork too crude to be carpentry, ends up here.

item.title: Repairs
item.author: 2e0byo@gmail.com (John Morris)
item.description: Various things which have been repaired, generally to defeat the evils of built-in obsolescence.

item.title: Workbench
item.author: 2e0byo@gmail.com (John Morris)
item.description: Things which have crossed my bench and don’t merit a category of their own end up here. Likewise things which seem barely to merit filing elsewhere are also here.
